name: Seraphina Sera Rayne
description:
Seraphina Rayne was born and raised in the sprawling megacity of Neo-Tokyo on Earth. Growing up in the shadows of towering skyscrapers and neon-lit streets, she became fascinated with the idea of exploring the vast unknown that lay beyond. Sera's family had a long history of mining, dating back several generations, and she quickly developed a knack for piloting and engineering.

Eager to escape the confines of her city life and seek her own adventures, Sera joined the group of space cowboys venturing out to mine the Lithium rock. With her fiery red hair, freckled face, and a contagious grin that could brighten up even the darkest corner of space, Sera earned the nickname "Sera the Ray of Sunshine."

Not only does Sera bring her exceptional piloting skills to the team, but she also possesses an uncanny ability to fix just about anything on the fly. Her years of tinkering with broken machinery in her family's workshop have honed her mechanical prowess. Sera is always ready to roll up her sleeves and get her hands dirty, keeping their ship patched up and running smoothly throughout their mining operations.

Despite her sunny disposition, Sera is no stranger to the harsh realities of life on the frontier. Beneath her cheerful demeanor lies a resilient spirit, molded by years of growing up in a city that demanded strength and adaptability. Sera's optimism and determination, paired with her unwavering loyalty to her crewmates, make her an invaluable member of the team as they navigate the uncharted frontiers of space.
